promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young legendary wolf electric-type pokemon wearing lightning-charged armor. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or wolf. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltarmoris, a a chibi young legendary wolf electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Flashing Bolt. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "wolf", "electric" or "Voltarmoris". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, wolf-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: A chibi legend; its fur crackles with unseen energy. Harnessing Flashing Bolt, it stealthily bounds across mountaintops, lit only by starlight.
